targets.expr: sum by (instance) (probe_ssl_earliest_cert_expiry{instance=~"https://.*",job=~"$job", module="http_2xx"} - time()) / count by (instance) (probe_ssl_earliest_cert_expiry{instance=~"https://.*",job=~"$job", module="http_2xx"})

targets.legendFormat: {{instance}} - UDPLITE_inuse - Udplite sockets currently in use
{{instance}} - UDP_inuse - Udp sockets currently in use
{{instance}} - TCP_inuse - Tcp sockets currently in use
InSegs - Segments received, including those received in error. This count includes segments received on currently established connections
OutSegs - Segments sent, including those on current connections but excluding those containing only retransmitted octets

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (probe_ssl_earliest_cert_expiry{job="$job",instance=~"https://.*", module="http_2xx"} - time()) / count by (instance) (probe_ssl_earliest_cert_expiry{job="$job",instance=~"https://.*", module="http_2xx"})
